original_title: Macho, fêmea & Cia (A vida erótica de Caim e Abel)
overview: (The Erotic Life of Cain and Abel) Pornochanchada, which tells the story of the beginning of time in the "paradise" of Eden. With the participation of Deus (voiceover) and the snake of the Tree of Life (hilariously performed by Fernando Benini).
title: Macho, fêmea & Cia (A vida erótica de Caim e Abel)
